name: Click to the Moon
description:
Using a button that makes money, form a team, buy parts, and launch a rocket to the moon! In this clicker game, you earn a buncha cash to gain more rocket scientists, and beef up yo rocket ship.

Then, launch your cool rocket into the skies! Collect those sky...coins and avoid the inexplicable spike balls in the atmosphere! Reach the moon and achieve coolness and stuff.

Upgrades:

Fins - Easier left/right movement

Nose - Lose less speed

Engine/Booster - Initial launch speed

Body - Lose less speed when crashing into obstacles

Scientist - Earns cash for you, because economy!
